<<<<<<< HEAD
Spectators, make a ring, that you may see the fatal battle which is like to be fought by two pow'rfull combatants Lichtenberger, Johannes, 15th cent.
1 sheet ([1] p.).
Printed for the author, and are to be sold by Henry Brome at the Gun in Ivy-Lane, London : 1663.
Title from first three lines of text. Verse: "Spectators, make a ring, that you may see ..." "Imprimatur, Jan. 21. 1663. Roger L'estrange." Reproduction of original in the British Library.
=======
